title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.2 - Access to vehicles carrying domestic animals, feedstuffs or garbage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.2 - Access to vehicles carrying domestic animals, feedstuffs or garbage

State Regulations

The commissioner, each veterinarian, inspector and other
authorized employees of the Department of Agriculture and Markets shall have
full access to all vehicles, including motor vehicles, whether they be upon
public or private lands, highways or waterways within the State of New York, whenever any such officer or employee has reasonable grounds to believe that
such vehicles are being used to transport or hold domestic animals, including
poultry, or feedstuffs therefor or to transport or hold
garbage. Notes

52.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
